article: How to Recognize Your Twin Flame
intro: On the hunt for your twin flame? This profound, fiery bond can forge a dynamic and unforgettable friendship or relationship—so, it makes perfect sense that you’d want to recognize and connect with this special someone in your life!

points.name: What exactly is a twin flame?
Signs You’ve Met Your Twin Flame

steps.title: You have really big ups and downs.
steps.subtitle: For better or worse, twin flame relationships are dialed up to 1000% all the time. That intensity can be great when you’re both sharing something exciting, but it’s far less fun when you’re having an argument. Needless to say, the highs of a twin flame relationship are stratospheric, while the lows can be subterranean.
sub-points: It doesn’t take a lot for twin flames to butt heads, believe it or not. Knowing and understanding another person on such a deep level can lead to a lot of emotionally-charged conversations.

points.name: Stages of a Twin Flame Relationship

steps.title: You join up with twin flame again.
steps.subtitle: Some twin flames are able to come back together after taking some time to really think over everything that’s happened between them. This can lead to an even more profound and intimate relationship.
sub-points: If you and your twin flame do reconnect, use these past relationship stages as a learning experience. You want to really stick with your twin flame at this point!
